title: If league is "not that important to me" and you"dont really" care...DONT PLAY RANKED
body: It is so God Damn inconsiderate for people to play ranked when they really don't care about their rank or moving up. Its grossly unfair to teammates, and they should be playing normals. If you don't care about ranked, play normals.

This is likely just because you don't play many normals.

It's because I'm diamond. Once you get to higher elo, matchmaking in normals becomes totally fucked and you start seeing Diamonds laning against golds regularly. That goes about as well as you think it would. There simply aren't enough higher elo players in normals to get decent matchmaking, so you end up with games that are almost always total stomps because a silver Lux had to lane against a diamond Zed or some shit.

While I do care for rank, I have to avoid ranked most of the time, because if I try and take it seriously, but mess up, and I give first blood by accident, not only am I a little tilted from my mistake but I get flamed the shit out of by people who act like they're CHALLENJOUR and we're holding them back from their true potential.

People being toxic and making Ranked, while it is suppose to be serious, a really fucking awful experience, is not what I play ranked for. I know I'm not the best; if I was I'd be Diamond+ and applying to eSports teams. But seriously, people need to get over the fact that people make mistakes, because in the end you make people not wanna fucking take ranked seriously or in my case, rarely play it at all, cause of your nasty attitude.

I know people who tend to not try in ranked because they know they'll never satisfy their teammates (lower elo, anyway,) and while I say don't play ranked if you aren't gonna be serious, I can sorta see where they're coming from.

I know that first blood is important, but I have yet to see a game decided with 1 kill for the winning team and 0 for the losing team. 

I would like to see a percentage of winning for games based on first blood.

You never know, it might statistically be advantageous to give first blood.

Fun Fact: People are allowed to play what ever they wish. If they don't care about progress and ranked generally most stay away from that type of play. That being said, if a friend of theirs is only into playing ranked and your not; does that mean they can't play with their friends because you don't want them in your game? No, of course not. I'm sorry you lost your game(assumption) but honestly it is a game. If you're so competitive that one loss out of an entire season brings you to this point (or multiple losses for the sake of argument) then maybe it's you who should step back from ranked. I get wanting to win and progress in ranked. I also get wanting to better your play style and see results of that. But to outright say people shouldn't play ranked based on having fun is just absurd. This is a VIDEO GAME. Yes, it can be competitive. Yes it can be frustrating, but at the end of the day it is for fun purposes. Even competitive players have to have some sort of fun otherwise I'm sure they wouldn't be where they are today. If you find yourself not in that boat. Take a break.

I remember when I started playing League at the start of Season 3 or halfway through Season 3 and I had a really good time, PvP/Bots... But just like Deadlychuck it's gotten worse, and worse on me because I am consistently stressed out, but I can't stop playing, I think hey, I can win a game today, and end up going on a 10 game loss streak no matter what queue/mode im playing. And honestly, don't play Ranked for a few reasons:

1. DynQ/Premades - This has been said multiple times but these groups of people and this Queue make the game especially unfun and unbalanced than just lightly unbalanced.

2. Borders - Get removed if you don't uphold your rank every season. Example : Gold Border Season 5, Season 6 you end up Silver, you get a silver border, Bronze, you get an icon, no border.

3. Hextech Crafting - Riots implementation of free skins, is quite atrocious as the system needs some tuning. You get stockpiles of chests, but a droplet of key fragments. Needing 3 fragments per chest is really extreme considering you can earn 5 chests and open 2 of them unless you are really lucky, but then you gotta hope for something new, and not something you already own. But it's a hell of a lot better than trudging through Ranked for 1 Skin.

4. Hextech Crafting 2 - A Victorious skin for those who trek on to Gold 5 or Higher.. Sadly this is the only way to earn this Skin, but you gotta ask yourself, is this even worth it considering I can just play Normals and try having fun and earn the rest of the skins FOR FREE(Yes, even ULTIMATE SKINS!) 

5. Riot Noticing - The less people that play Ranked DynQ, and switch to Normal DynQ/Blind Pick will show them that their system is completely flawed and they'll possibly bring back SoloQ or pay attention to their players more.

As is, Ranked doesn't have any benefits that I care about, nor should anyone care about. And if you ARE in it for the Victorious Skin, remember it is Random, and it will probably go to someone who doesn't deserve it, or caters to #biglcsplays.
